main event: A pilot observed an oblong brownish object resembling a collapsed balloon during a flight near Chillicothe, Mo.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 11 May 1958,The object was stationary and seen for approximately 1 minute,The pilot considered it potentially strange during a practice intercept,The object was noted to have particles hanging from its main body,It was determined to be a balloon with radiosonde equipment attached.
witness description: 2/LT Jerry J. Trout, pilot of F-84E
